byline.original: By EVELYN M. RUSLI and AZAM AHMED

abstract: The hedge fund founded by Richard C. Perry has cut about 30 portfolio managers and analysts and three partners, according to people with knowledge of the situation.
snippet: The hedge fund founded by Richard C. Perry has cut about 30 portfolio managers and analysts and three partners, according to people with knowledge of the situation.
lead_paragraph: The hedge fund Perry Capital is retrenching, according to two people with knowledge of the situation.

headline.main: Perry Capital Cuts Staff and Closes Hong Kong Office
